title: When takeoff doesn’t go to plan
text: Bargains lurk in last minute bookings 13:54 PM Robyn Ironside National Travel Writer PRICES for airline seats and hotels typically soar in the countdown to Christmas but there are serious bargains to be had if you know where to look. Bargains lurk in last minute bookings 13:52 PM Robyn Ironside National Travel Writer PRICES for airline seats and hotels typically soar in the countdown to Christmas but there are serious bargains to be had if you know where to look. Bizarre $7 billion plan to build new city 11:10 AM Kate Schneider WORK is set to begin on a massive new “tourist” city, and the project is definitely not short of cash, but there’s a twist. It’s all about the location. What really happens in the cockpit 9:46 AM Rowena Ryan EVER wondered what happens in the cockpit? This video lets passengers watch what the pilots get up to all the way from takeoff to landing. ‘Gross, what did they do to my luggage?’ 8:27 AM Staff writers A WOMAN has told of her horror at getting back to her hotel room and opening her bag only to find some rather disgusting surprises inside.
